name: validation_to_hardening
schema:
CREATE TABLE `validation_to_hardening` (
	`validation_profile_id` text NOT NULL,
	`hardening_profile_id` text NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY(`validation_profile_id`, `hardening_profile_id`),
	FOREIGN KEY (`validation_profile_id`) REFERENCES `profiles`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade,
	FOREIGN KEY (`hardening_profile_id`) REFERENCES `hardening_profiles`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade
)
